name: memento-sveltekit-electron-typescript
description: Memento: how to use Svelte with Electron and TypeScript
author: Samuele de Tomasi <samuele@stranianelli.com>

scripts.out:win: npm run svelte:build && npm run compile && electron-builder build --win --publish never
scripts.publish:win: npm run svelte:build && npm run compile && electron-builder build --win --publish always
scripts.out:mac: npm run svelte:build && npm run compile && electron-builder build --mac --publish never
scripts.publish:mac: npm run svelte:build && npm run compile && electron-builder build --mac --publish always
scripts.out:linux: npm run svelte:build && npm run compile && electron-builder build --linux --publish never
scripts.publish:linux: npm run svelte:build && npm run compile && electron-builder build --linux --publish always
scripts.out:all: npm run out:win && npm run out:mac && npm run out:linux
scripts.publish:all: npm run publish:win && npm run publish:mac && npm run publish:linux
